sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, fName VARCHAR(50), lName VARCHAR(50), title VARCHAR(50), dept VARCHAR(50), mgrId INTEGER, mobPhone VARCHAR(30))
